name: click
help: Click on an element on the page.

name: waitfor
help: Wait for an element to appear on a page.

name: break
help: Break out of the current each or repeat loop.

name: each
help: Run a set of actions for each element in the set of matched elements.

name: goback
help: Go back to the previous page in the browser.

name: locator
help: Accesses data within a shadow-root or iframe using a locator.

name: navigate
help: Navigate browser to a new page.

name: reload
help: Reload the current page in the browser.

name: repeat
help: Repeat a set of actions until a condition is met.

name: screenshot
help: Take a screenshot of the page or a selected area of the page.

name: scroll
help: Scroll to the top or bottom of the page, or to an element.

name: snooze
help: Snooze for a set period of time.

name: switch
help: Switch to an action within set of actions based on a condition.

name: yield
help: Yield back to the host. Use as directed by development.
